LanguageData.cbSlavePriorities: Set Priorities for Slaves? (Requires Simple Slavery)
LanguageData.cbPrisonerPriorities: Set Priorities for Prisoners? (Requires Prison Labor)
LanguageData.cbSetPawnTitles: Set Pawn Titles? (Useful with 'Show Titles' feature of Guards For Me)
LanguageData.cbForceBedRest: Forced Bed Rest for injured pawns?
LanguageData.cbUseLearningRates: Consider Learning Rate when selecting best pawn?
LanguageData.ttJobs: What Jobs this WorkGroup contains. All Jobs in a given WorkGroup will have the same Work Priority.
LanguageData.ttAnd: What other WorkGroups can be assigned to the same pawn, who has been assigned this WorkGroup. This is useful for having your Doctors not planting, but your Growers being back-up Haulers.
LanguageData.ttStats: What Stats are important for this WorkGroup. These act as a multiplier for the skill value. A pawn with Lv8 in Plants and 2 field hands will be selected over a pawn with Lv10 in Plants, if Plant Work Speed is selected.
LanguageData.HighStatsTip: These are Stats that we consider higher as better (e.g., Butchery Speed, Butchery Efficiency)
LanguageData.AllStatsTip: All available stats. Use the "<" and ">" buttons to move them between lists.
LanguageData.LowStatsTip: These are Stats that we consider lower as better (e.g., Food Poison Chance)
LanguageData.ttTraits: Select Traits that must be on Pawns for this WorkGroup, Want to have on this WorkGroup, or Can't have on this WorkGroup
LanguageData.MustHavesTip: Pawns who are missing any of the Traits in this list will not be selected for this WorkGroup
LanguageData.WantToHavesTip: Pawns who have some of the Traits in this list will be selected over Pawns who have none of them
LanguageData.CantHavesTip: Pawns who have any of the Traits in this list will not be selected for this WorkGroup
